patthana8.19:1.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.19:1.1_1: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.19:1.1_2: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto nasāsavo ca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.19:2.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.19:3.1_0: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavañca āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.19:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
